verses.1: Jerusalem khuanai, Bethfage khua a omna Oliv Mual a tun uh ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite nih ma sawl a,
verses.2: “Mai-a a om khua ah va pai un. Na tun uh ciangin la nuta khau a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Hong sut unla hong kai un.
verses.3: Mi khatpeuh in hong paupih leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci le-uhcin hong paisak pah ding hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
verses.4: Hih thu pen kamsang paʼ thugenna a tun nadingin a piang ahi hi.
verses.5: Tua a genna ah, “En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi. Kiniamkhiatna tawh lapi tung le la no tungah tuangin hong pai hi, ci-in Zion khua mite kiangah gen un,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Nungzui tegel zong Jesu sawl bangin va pai uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute in a la nuta hong paipih uh a, a tungah a puante uh a phah khit uh ciangin Jesu a tuang hi.
verses.8: Mihon tampite in ama pai nading lampi ah a puante uh na phah uh a, a dangte in nisuh hiangte satin lampi ah a na phah uh hi.
verses.9: A mai-a pai mihonte le a nung a zui mihonte awng uh a, “Davidʼ suan Jesu in phatna ngah tahen! Topaʼ min tawh hong pai pa in thupha ngah tahen! A sangpen a om Pasian in phatna ngah tahen!” a ci uh hi.
verses.10: Jerusalem khua sung a tun uh ciangin khua sung mi khempeuh gamlum henhan uh a, “Hih pa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in khatlekhat a kidong uh hi.
verses.11: Mihonpite in, “Galilee gam Nazareth khua pan a kamsang Jesu hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Jesu lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawl khia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om miteʼ sabuai le vakhu zuakteʼ tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi.
verses.13: Amaute kiangah, “Pasian in Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktaakna phualpi na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.14: Biakinn sung Jesu kiangah mittawte le khebaite hong pai uh a, amah in amaute a damsak hi.
verses.15: Ahi zongin siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in a nalamdang bawlte mu-in, biakinn sungah naupangte in, “Davidʼ suan Jesu in phatna ngah tahen!” ci-in a kikona a zak uh ciangin heh uh ahih manin
verses.16: Jesu kiangah, “Hih naupangteʼ otna na za hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Ka za hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Naungekte le naupangteʼ kam tawh a cingtaak phatna na gensak hi,’ a cihna thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute nusia a, khuapi sung pan pai khia-in Bethany khua ah a giak hi.
verses.18: A zingsang ciangin khuapi zuanin hong paikik laitakin Jesu a gil a kial hi.
verses.19: Lam gei ah theikung khat mu ahih manin a gei ah va pai a, ahi zongin a teh sim loh bangmah a mu kei hi. Jesu in tua theikung kiangah, “Gah ngei nawn kei in!” a cih khit phetin a theikung a si pah hi.
verses.20: Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin lamdang sa uh ahih manin, “Bang hangin theikung tua ci sih pah ahi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin
verses.21: Jesu in, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin ah: Note in uplahna nei het loin, upna taktak na neih nak uh leh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawn ah, ‘Na omna pan pai khia-in tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le-uhcin na cih bangun piang ding hi.
verses.22: Upna na neih nak uh leh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.23: Biakinn tual sungah Jesu lutkik a, thuhilhin a om laitakin siampi liante le upate ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hih nate kua thu tawh bawl a, na bawl nading kua in aana hong pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin
verses.24: Jesu in, “Kei zong thu khat kong dong masa ding hi. Na hong dawn nak uh leh kei zong kua thu tawh bawl cih kong gen ding hi.
verses.25: Johan in tuiphum theih nading thu koi lai panin ngah ahi hiam? Pasian kiang panin thu ngah ahi hiam, ahih kei leh mihingte kiang panin thu ngah ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute khatlekhat kiseel uh a, “Pasian kiang pan hi,” ci lehang, “Bang hangin um lo na hi uh hiam?” hong ci ding hi.
verses.26: Ahi zongin, “Mihingte kiang pan hi,” ci leuleu lehang, mi khempeuh in Johan pen kamsang hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh ahih manin mihonte i kihta zel hi, kici uh hi.
verses.27: Tua ahih ciangin Jesu kiangah, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in zong amaute kiangah, “Kei zong hih nate, kua thu tawh ka bawl cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.28: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta u zaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tu ni-in leenggah lo ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin
verses.29: amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi.
verses.30: Tua ciangin a ta nau zaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi.
verses.31: Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a paʼ deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A ta u zaw a ta hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin ah: Pasianʼ ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte le numei paktatte lut masa zaw ding hi.
verses.32: Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei paktatte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uh hi.
verses.33: “Thu gentehna dang khat na ngai lai un. Mi khat in lo zuanin leenggui suan a, a kimkot umin, leenggah cil nading bawl a, a hon nading tausang khat a lam khit ciangin lo khawhlawhte khawhlawhsakin gam dangah a pai hi.
verses.34: Leenggah min hun a tun ciangin ama ngah ding teng a va la dingin lo khawhlawhte kiangah a nasemte a paisak hi.
verses.35: Lo khawhlawhte in a nasemte na manin khat na sat gawp uh a, khat na thatin, khat suang tawh na deng gawp uh hi.
verses.36: Tua ciangin lo nei pa in a masa-a sangin nasem a tam zaw va paisak leuleu a, ahi zongin a masa-a mah bangin a nasemte a na bawlsia veve uh hi.
verses.37: Tua khit ciangin ka tapa paisak leng na zahtak ding uh hi, ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin a tapa a paisak hi.
verses.38: Ahi zongin lo khawhlawhte in a tapa a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih pa pen a gamhluah ding pa ahi hi. Hong pai un; amah thatin a luah ding teng eite in la ni,’ a kici uh hi.
verses.39: Tua ahih manin amah manin that uh a, lo nawl ah a paai uh hi.
verses.40: Tua ahih ciangin leenggah lo nei pa hong pai ciangin a lo khawhlawhte bangci bawl ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.41: Amaute in, “Tua migilote that gawp dinga, a hunhunin leenggah a pia ding lo khawhlawh dangte khosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.42: Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi. Hih pen Topaʼ bawl hi a, i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ ci-in a kigelhna sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
verses.43: Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin ah: Note pen Pasian hong ki-uksak nawn lo dinga, a kilawmin a gamta ding mite bek Pasian in uk ding hi.
verses.44: Hih suang tungah a kia mi khempeuh kizan gawp dinga, mi khatpeuh tungah tua suang a kiat leh zong deng zan gawp ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.45: Siampi liante le Farisi mite in hih thu gentehna a zak uh ciangin amaute a cih nopna-in a gen ahih lam a phawk uh hi.
verses.46: Jesu a man dingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin mihonte in kamsang khatin ngaihsun uh ahih manin mihonte a kihtak manun a man ngam kei uh hi.
